attributes.action: inform councils that being English is a nationality & as so should be placed on goverment forms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime minister & other cabinet members should realise that by denying people the right to choose English as a nationality on any goverment form they are making people more rascist, one can place any other nationality on a form but not English. Why is this? We have a queen of England, A bank of England, but occording to the goverment there are no English people only British and other foreign nationals.Due to the prime ministers disloyalty to the nation he should be done for treason.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
